MOVI R7, 6
NEG R7
MOVI R1, 3
ADD R7, R1 
ADD R7, R1 
JZR R7, 3
JZR R0, 7
JZR R0, 7

10 111 000 0110
01 111 000 0000
10 001 000 0011
00 111 001 0000
00 111 001 0000
11 111 000 0011
11 000 000 0111
11 000 000 0111

----
"101110000110"  --MOVI R7, 6
"011110000000"	--NEG R7
"100010000011"	--MOVI R1, 3
"001110010000"	--ADD R7, R1 
"001110010000"	--ADD R7, R1 
"111110000011"	--JZR R7, 3
"110000000111"	--JZR R0, 7
"110000000111"	--JZR R0, 7
